title: What are the best ways to share music with friends? - Quora

response.answer_text: I just noticed this older thread and was surprised to see the answers.   First, song sharing is illegal as you all know, so why even bother posting a thread here.  Sharing playlists?   A lot of work for the mainstream user, so not "the best way" either.   YouTube has come close to making this work as per one post, but I must agree with Graeme Kelly here!   And on that note, want to add a brand new, viable solution:  Check out my thread on this same topic on Quora:  Sam Alkan's answer to What explains the explosion in social music-sharing entrepreneurial activity?

The best product I've seen (by far) for sharing music with friends is Spotify, but this product is not yet available in the US.  Spotify lets you create and share playlists very impulsively. Building and sharing Spotify playlists is like crack.
